description: Event Information Organizer: Avalanche Team1 Hosted by: Ru Wang Date: Wednesday, February 11, 2026 Time: 1:30 PM 5:00 PM Venue: Visible upon registration Speakers: Co-host: Attended by: Media&Communities: Event Rundown 13:30 - 14:00: Registration & Welcome 14:00 - 14:05: Opening Remarks by Ru Wang, Avalanche Team1 Part I: Keynote Speech Time: 14:05 - 14:20 Speech (15 min): The Five-Layer Technical Architecture of RWA Tokenization and Avalanche's PracticeSpeaker: Jacky Kong, Head of Hong Kong, Ava Labs Core Content: Decode the five-layer architecture: Data Asset, Blockchain Infrastructure, Tokenization, Application, Regulatory Compliance Part II: Keynote Speech Time: 14:20 - 14:35 Speech (15 min):Speaker: Xuanfeng Hu, Chief Marketing Officer, FinChain Part III: Keynote Speech Time: 14:35 - 14:50 Speech (15 min):Speaker: Flora Lau, Head of Digital Asset, Hang Feng Technology Innovation Part IV: Panel Discussions: Trends and Convergence Panel 1: 14:50 - 15:40 (50 min)Unlocking a Trillion-Dollar Market: How Can Traditional Institutions and Web3 Achieve Mutual Success Moderator: Vladimir Shapovalov,Head of Research,CointelegraphPanelist:Queenie Le, Regional Expansion Lead APAC, TetherAndy Lee, Partner, HashKey TokenisationEdwin Cheung, Global Head of OTC, GateTianwei Liu, CEO & Co-Founder, StraitsX Zen Fong,Head of Partnerships, Evolve Panel 2: 15:45 - 16:35 (50 min)The Path to Compliance: From On-Chain Issuance to Global CirculationModerator:Jeffrey Tchui, Executive...
